text:

Making all in srclib
Making all in apr
don't know how to make all (bu42).
*** Error code 1 (bu21)
*** Error code 1 (bu21)
elvis 211#
creator: dave.bevan@ntlworld.com

text:
A workaround is to install GNU sed and make sure it's before the native sed in
your PATH.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19251 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
dave.bevan@ntlworld.com
text:
To resolve under IRIX, you need to install fw_sed from the site: 
freeware.sgi.com, then do the following, post install:

setenv PATH /usr/freeware/bin:$PATH

Then the ./configure works ok. I don't know why SGI's sed is different from the 
GNU sed, or why the apache installer doesn't use lowest-common-denominator 
software.

-- Dave.
